com.android.view

类 BannerPager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.android.view.BannerPager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.support.v4.view.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class BannerPager
extends android.widget.FrameLayout
implements android.support.v4.view.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
    Created by Relin on 2018-10-09.
    轮播图视图页控件，可以通过自定义的图片显示指示器的样式形状，shape图片或者 切图都可以，页面点击事件setOnPageClickListener(com.android.view.BannerPager.OnBannerPagerClickListener)， 设置数据通过setAdapter(com.android.widget.BannerAdapter),同时支持设置指示器布局的边距 和指示器本身的边距大小，指示器的位置 setIndicatorGravity(int)
    rotate the map view page control, which can display the style shape of the indicator, shape or all images are ok. Click on the page event setOnPageClickListener(com.android.view.BannerPager.OnBannerPagerClickListener), sets the data through setAdapter(com.android.widget.BannerAdapter), and supports setting the margins of the indicator layout and the size of the margin of the indicator itself, and the position of the indicator.
